markdownContent:
*Unexpectedly*, after talking with Direktor Laura, you've been accepted for the internship. On your question, when you should start, she exclaimed: «Right now!» So you agreed on coming Monday and here we are.

You're standing in front of this large building you've already seen on the internet and notice that there are actually two entrances; the main entrance, through which the visitors normally go, and a somewhat hidden side entrance. It's Monday, so the museum's closed. You're not sure, which door to try, but there is a threateningly looking, blinking red light next to the main door, so you fear there is an alarm active. You could be considered an employee now, so the side entrance would be appropriate. But no one knows you yet so it's going to be real awkward to explain, why you just entered the museum without invitation...
